movies.title: Wei qing
movies.plot: After being thrown out of the police academy, Debbie Fung (Ellen Chan) gets a new chance but instead the proposition is to go undercover. Accepting the mission to get close to tycoon Lau Fuk Tin (Michael Wong) as he's suspected of a number of murders of women, under the disguise of Maryanne, Debbie quickly gets close to Lau. Going so far as getting almost permanent residence with the man, Debbie witness horrific things on the grounds. Despite, affection starting to develop towards her target.
movies.simplePlot: After being thrown out of the police academy, Debbie Fung (Ellen Chan) gets a new chance but instead the proposition is to go undercover. Accepting the mission to get close to tycoon Lau ...

biography.bio: Ellen Chan was born on February 16, 1966 in Hong Kong, China. She is an actress, known for Exilé (2006), Nan yang shi da xie shu (1995) and Wei qing (1993).
biography.name: Ellen Chan

biography.bio: Michael Wong has managed to become a star of Asian cinema in Hong Kong despite not even speaking a word of Chinese Cantonese, and he had no training in martial arts; in Asia, the actor known for his starring role in action film Final Option (1994) and Fei hu (1996) where he plays a cop; for First Option the actor was nominated at the Hong Kong Film Awards, the Oscar of Hong Kong cinema, and later starred in a myriad of productions and movies oriental, often unpublished in the the West such as Yeshou xingjing (1998)_, which is considered one of the most successful films of Hong Kong cinema; actor took part but also in many U.S. films such as Niki Larson (1993) starring opposite Jackie Chan,Piège à Hong Kong (1998) with 'Jean Claude Van Damme', and the film Cold War (2012), and soon we will see the actor in the italian film The Mercury Conspiracy (2013) with Luca Barbareschi.
biography.name: Michael Wong

biography.bio: Chi-Shing Chan is an actor and assistant director, known for City on Fire (1987), The God of Cookery (1996) and Shanghai Express (1986).
biography.name: Chi-Shing Chan

biography.bio: Paul Che is an actor, known for Push (2009), One Nite in Mongkok (2004) and Election (2005).
biography.name: Paul Che

biography.bio: Billy Sau Yat Ching is known for his work on Project A 2 (1987), Dream Lovers (1986) and Sheng si xian (1985).
biography.name: Billy Sau Yat Ching

biography.bio: Maria Cordero was born in 1954 in Macao, China. She is known for her work on Vagues invisibles (2006), City on Fire (1987) and Hoi sam gui miu ba (1989).
biography.name: Maria Cordero

biography.bio: Pak Fei is an actor, known for City on Fire (1987), The Eight Immortals Restaurant: The Untold Story (1993) and As Tears Go By (1988).
biography.name: Pak Fei

biography.bio: Wai Man Lau is an actress, known for Nan quan wang II zhi Qi zhuang shan he (1985), Top Squad (1988) and Duo qing jian ke wu qing jian (1977).
biography.name: Wai Man Lau

biography.bio: Yan Nam is an actress, known for Wei qing (1993), Girl Gang (1993) and Do feng fai ching (1993).
biography.name: Yan Nam

biography.bio: Charlie Ng is an actor, known for Underground Judgement (1994), 1/2 Duan qing (1986) and Run and Kill (1993).
biography.name: Charlie Ng

biography.bio: David Siu is an actor, known for File Noir (1989), Wo ai Fa La Li (1994) and Refuge (2017).
biography.name: David Siu

biography.bio: Kai-Keung Sze is an actor, known for All About Ah-Long (1989), Mad Mission (1982) and Un couple explosif (1992).
biography.name: Kai-Keung Sze

biography.bio: Joi-Sam Tang is an actor, known for Mu hou sha shou (2003), The Days of Being Dumb (1992) and Wei qing (1993).
biography.name: Joi-Sam Tang

biography.bio: Chi Yeung Wong was born on August 1, 1967. He is an actor, known for Once Upon a Time in China (1991), Si wang jian yu (1994) and Du xia 1999 (1998).
biography.name: Chi Yeung Wong

biography.bio: Ngai-Ho Yu is an actor, known for Endless Love (1993), Un couple explosif (1992) and Shen suan (1992).
biography.name: Ngai-Ho Yu
